Comments_List: This course offers an overview of the history of collecting and European museums in relation to the colonial enterprise. It covered everything from 16th century Latin America to the 19th century Congo, to present-day questions revolving around restitution.

The strength of the course was that it covered a lot of material but this was perhaps also a weakness. There could have been smoother transitions from week to week and from the transition from one cultural context to another.
